data.meta_description: SHANTI at the University of Virginia - Sciences, Humanities and Arts Network of Technological Initiatives: SHANTI promotes innovation in the humanities, social sciences and arts at the University of Virginia through supporting the application of advanced technologies in research, teaching, publication and engagement across the entire community.
